payment-list.title: Список заявок на списание средств со вклада

message.text: Конечная дата должна быть больше либо равна начальной

payment-list.hql-query: select claim from com.rssl.phizic.business.documents.InternalTransfer as claim where claim.formName = 'InternalTransferClaim' and claim.owner.id = :loginId and (:state_list is null or :state_list = '' or claim.state.code in (:state)) and (:fromDate is null or claim.dateCreated >= :fromDate) and (:toDate is null or claim.dateCreated <= :toDate ) and (:deposit is null or :deposit = '' or claim.attributes['deposit-description'].stringValue = :deposit) order by claim.dateCreated desc, claim.changed desc, claim.id desc
